Welcome to Jon Portella’s Medium profile

Ready to learn?

Time is a precious commodity, that’s why I write short articles to make developers better at what they do.

Nevertheless, sometimes I’ll **deep dive **into crucial topics and share my research in synthesized articles.

Hence, this knowledge is grouped in thematic series:

**OMBD — One Minute To Become a Better Developer ***Become a more successful software developer by reading short nuggets of knowledge, one minute at a time.*jportella93.medium.com

DD — Deep Dives*Gain in-depth knowledge about a topic through simple explanations.*jportella93.medium.com

OMONP — One Minute, One NPM PackageDiscover cool NPM packages and how to use them in one minutejportella93.medium.com
